title: Sidewall, 1820–40
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Carola R. Green
description: Blue circular motif composed of disk with four white circles enclosed, surrounded by rayed circle, serpentine-rayed circle and outer band of foliated scallops. To right and left, ascending serpentine foliage in green. Alternating blue motif of foliate cross.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1820–40.
1820–40. Block-printed. Gift of Mrs. Carola R. Green. 1939-58-2.
